meanings.definition: A man who is meticulously groomed and fashionable, typically living in a city.
meanings.sent1: The metrosexual always looks stylish and neat.
meanings.sent2: He is considered a metrosexual because of his sharp dressing.
meanings.sent3: The metrosexual's closet is probably more organized than mine!
meanings.sent4: His metrosexual appearance shines like a polished gem.
meanings.sent5: The metrosexual's fashion sense is like a beacon in the city.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to a man who is fashion-conscious and takes care of his appearance.
meanings.sent1: She admired his metrosexual sense of style.
meanings.sent2: The metrosexual man always looks put together.
meanings.sent5: The metrosexual touch in his outfit was undeniable.

meanings.definition: A person, typically a man, who is interested in fashion and grooming.
meanings.sent1: The fashion magazine featured a profile on a metrosexual.
meanings.sent2: He is known among his friends as the metrosexual of the group.
meanings.sent3: The metrosexual's love for fashion is contagious.
meanings.sent4: In a sea of trends, he stood out as a metrosexual wave.
meanings.sent5: His metrosexual passion for grooming is unmatched.
